name: ym2151-typescript-webaudio
description: YM2151 emulator with TypeScript and WebAudio

scripts.build:wasm: cd src/phase2 && emcc opm.c -o opm.js -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_OPM_Clock","_OPM_Write","_OPM_Read","_OPM_Reset","_malloc","_free"]' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall","cwrap","getValue","setValue"]' -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_NAME='createOPMModule' -O2
